game_description: Use your plumber powers to place pipes, join the vases and make the water flow! Help little ducks to have fun surfing a water jet! You don't want to sadden a duck... Beware, make it in time, or the water will overflow... Reasons to become our favourite plumber: - You'll be provided with many, many, many Pipes! - You'll meet lots of nice ducks, see stunning waterfalls... - Puffy clouds will guide you along the way! - Positional sounds & music (9 different soundtracks) will relax and alert you when it's time to move! - Day, Night and Autumn worlds, for a grand total of 54 challenging levels (and more to come!): hours of challenging gameplay! - 2 Game modes : classic, challenge. - Challenge your friends with Achievements and Leaderboards! - Learn how to plumb and profit in real life!
